title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions         Kickapoo Cavern State Park and Devil's Sinkhole State Natural Area offer seasonal bat flight programs. Kickapoo Cavern also offers cave tours. Follow the links at right for more information on these and other local and regional attractions.
